verses.verse: The book <WG976> of the generation <WG1078> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> the son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> the son <WG5207> of Abraham. <WG11>
Abraham <WG11> begat <WG1080> Isaac; <WG2464> and Isaac <WG2464> begat <WG1080> Jacob; <WG2384> and Jacob <WG2384> begat <WG1080> Judas <WG2455> and his brothers; <WG80>
And Judas <WG2455> begat <WG1080> Phares <WG5329> and Zara <WG2196> of Thamar; <WG2283> and Phares <WG5329> begat <WG1080> Esrom; <WG2074> and Esrom <WG2074> begat <WG1080> Aram; <WG689>
And Aram <WG689> begat <WG1080> Aminadab; <WG284> and Aminadab <WG284> begat <WG1080> Naasson; <WG3476> and Naasson <WG3476> begat <WG1080> Salmon; <WG4533>
And Salmon <WG4533> begat <WG1080> Booz <WG1003> of Rachab; <WG4477> and Booz <WG1003> begat <WG1080> Obed <WG5601> of Ruth; <WG4503> and Obed <WG5601> begat <WG1080> Jesse; <WG2421>
And Jesse <WG2421> begat <WG1080> David <WG1138> the king; <WG935> and David <WG1138> the king <WG935> begat <WG1080> Solomon <WG4672> of her that had been the wife of Urias; <WG3774>
And Solomon <WG4672> begat <WG1080> Roboam; <WG4497> and Roboam <WG4497> begat <WG1080> Abia; <WG7> and Abia <WG7> begat <WG1080> Asa; <WG760>
And Asa <WG760> begat <WG1080> Josaphat; <WG2498> and Josaphat <WG2498> begat <WG1080> Joram; <WG2496> and Joram <WG2496> begat <WG1080> Ozias; <WG3604>
And Ozias <WG3604> begat <WG1080> Joatham; <WG2488> and Joatham <WG2488> begat <WG1080> Achaz; <WG881> and Achaz <WG881> begat <WG1080> Ezekias; <WG1478>
And Ezekias <WG1478> begat <WG1080> Manasses; <WG3128> and Manasses <WG3128> begat <WG1080> Amon; <WG300> and Amon <WG300> begat <WG1080> Josias; <WG2502>
And Josias <WG2502> begat <WG1080> Jechonias <WG2423> and his brothers, <WG80> about <WG1909> the time <WG1909> they were carried <WG3350> away <WG3350> to Babylon: <WG897>
And after <WG3326> they were brought <WG3350> to Babylon, <WG897> Jechonias <WG2423> begat <WG1080> Salathiel; <WG4528> and Salathiel <WG4528> begat <WG1080> Zorobabel; <WG2216>
And Zorobabel <WG2216> begat <WG1080> Abiud; <WG10> and Abiud <WG10> begat <WG1080> Eliakim; <WG1662> and Eliakim <WG1662> begat <WG1080> Azor; <WG107>
And Azor <WG107> begat <WG1080> Sadoc; <WG4524> and Sadoc <WG4524> begat <WG1080> Achim; <WG885> and Achim <WG885> begat <WG1080> Eliud; <WG1664>
And Eliud <WG1664> begat <WG1080> Eleazar; <WG1648> and Eleazar <WG1648> begat <WG1080> Matthan; <WG3157> and Matthan <WG3157> begat <WG1080> Jacob; <WG2384>
And Jacob <WG2384> begat <WG1080> Joseph <WG2501> the husband <WG435> of Mary, <WG3137> of whom <WG3739> was born <WG1080> Jesus, <WG2424> who <WG3588> is called <WG3004> Christ. <WG5547>

So <WG3767> all <WG3956> the generations <WG1074> from Abraham <WG11> to David <WG1138> are fourteen <WG1180> generations; <WG1074> and from David <WG1138> until <WG2193> the carrying <WG3350> away <WG3350> into <WG3350> Babylon <WG897> are fourteen <WG1180> generations; <WG1074> and from the carrying <WG3350> away <WG3350> into <WG3350> Babylon <WG897> to Christ <WG5547> are fourteen <WG1180> generations. <WG1074>

Now <WG1161> the birth <WG1083> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> was on this <WG3779> wise: When as his mother <WG3384> Mary <WG3137> was espoused <WG3423> to Joseph, <WG2501> before <WG4250> <WG2228> they came <WG4905> together, <WG4905> she was found <WG2147> with child <WG1722> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost. <WG4151>

Then <WG1161> Joseph <WG2501> her husband, <WG435> being <WG5607> a just <WG1342> man, and not willing <WG2309> to make <WG3856> her a public <WG3856> example, <WG3856> was minded <WG1014> to put <WG630> her away <WG630> privately. <WG2977>

But while he thought <WG1760> on <WG1760> these <WG5023> things, behold, <WG2400> the angel <WG32> of the LORD <WG2962> appeared <WG5316> to him in a dream, <WG3677> saying, <WG3004> Joseph, <WG2501> you son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> fear <WG5399> not to take <WG3880> to you Mary <WG3137> your wife: <WG1135> for that which is conceived <WG1080> in her is of the Holy <WG40> Ghost. <WG4151>
And she shall bring <WG5088> forth <WG5088> a son, <WG5207> and you shall call <WG2564> his name <WG3686> JESUS: <WG2424> for he shall save <WG4982> his people <WG2992> from their sins. <WG266>
Now <WG1161> all <WG3650> this <WG5124> was done, <WG1096> that it might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> of the Lord <WG2962> by the prophet, <WG4396> saying, <WG3004>

Behold, <WG2400> a virgin <WG3933> shall be with child, <WG1722> <WG1064> <WG2192> and shall bring <WG5088> forth <WG5088> a son, <WG5207> and they shall <WG2564> call his name <WG3686> Emmanuel, <WG1694> which <WG3739> being interpreted <WG3177> is, God <WG2316> with us.
Then <WG1161> Joseph <WG2501> being raised <WG1326> from sleep <WG5258> did <WG4160> as the angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> had bidden <WG4367> him, and took <WG3880> to him his wife: <WG1135>
And knew <WG1097> her not till <WG2193> she had brought <WG5088> forth <WG5088> her firstborn <WG4416> son: <WG5207> and he called <WG2564> his name <WG3686> JESUS. <WG2424>
